text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) HKUDS/nanobot | 96% | stars now 4644 → est 19304 (range 19279-19329)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/nanobot
2) gavrielc/nanoclaw | 95% | stars now 4334 → est 15590 (range 15565-15615)
   https://github.com/gavrielc/nanoclaw
3) cloudflare/moltworker | 95% | stars now 7550 → est 16716 (range 16667-16765)
   https://github.com/cloudflare/moltworker
4) VoltAgent/awesome-openclaw-skills | 95% | stars now 8228 → est 16131 (range 16076-16186)
   https://github.com/VoltAgent/awesome-openclaw-skills
5) QwenLM/Qwen3-TTS | 94% | stars now 6788 → est 11396 (range 11347-11445)
   https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen3-TTS

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
